name: groxigo-libs
description: Groxigo Libraries Monorepo - Shared packages for iOS, Android, and Web

scripts.build: bun run build:core && bun run build:ui && bun run build:components
scripts.build:core: bun run --filter '@groxigo/tokens' build && bun run --filter '@groxigo/contracts' build && bun run --filter '@groxigo/api-types' build && bun run --filter '@groxigo/sdui' build
scripts.build:ui: bun run --filter '@groxigo/ui-core' build && bun run --filter '@groxigo/ui-elements' build && bun run --filter '@groxigo/ui-elements-web' build
scripts.build:components: bun run --filter '@groxigo/components' build && bun run --filter '@groxigo/components-web' build

author: Groxigo
